problems.problem name: Validate Topological Sort Order for a DAG
problems.description: Implement a function to determine if a given array is a valid topological sorting order of a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) represented as an adjacency list.
problems.inputs description: Input consists of a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) represented as an adjacency list and an array representing a potential topological sorting order.
problems.expected description: A boolean value indicating whether the given ordering is a valid topological sort of the graph.

problems.description: Implement Kahn's Algorithm to perform Topological Sort on a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).
problems.inputs description: Input consists of an array of tuples - inp1, where each tuple represents a directed edge in the graph. The array may be of arbitrary length.
problems.expected description: An array of nodes sorted in topological order.
